articles.title: Adani Green Energy gains on $1-billion investment prospect from parent group - Moneycontrol
articles.description: This move is a part of the group's aim to reach "ambitious green goals while facing maturing bonds next year".
articles.content: Adani Green Energy gained nearly 1 percent at the open on December 22, a day after it was reported that the parent group was planning to invest $1 billion into the renewable arm, driving the stock up… [+1439 chars]

articles.author: Moneycontrol News
articles.title: Zomato denies Shiprocket acquisition report, Jefferies bullish on stock - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Zomato has rubbished reports claiming that it will acquire startup Shiprocket for $2 billion. The company provided clarity due to the significant scale and potential market impact of the reported deal.
articles.content:
Shares of Zomato opened higher on December 22, a day after CEO Deepinder Goyal denied reports of his company looking to acquire Shiprocket for $2 billion.
